summary: Pokémon is a popular Japanese anime series that started in 1997. It's based on the video game franchise of the same name. The show follows Ash Ketchum and his Pokémon partner, Pikachu, as they travel to become Pokémon Masters. They compete in tournaments and explore different regions. The anime has had many seasons and introduced new characters over time. It helped make anime more popular worldwide and is one of the most successful video game adaptations, with lots of episodes and global viewers.
title: Pokémon (TV series)
